title: vanVeg
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Mediterranean, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, English, European
description: A vegetarian take away and delicatessen offering creative vegetarian and vegan fare, made-in-house from scratch using mainly regionally sourced vegetables and fruit. The shop carries a wide range of condiments, pickles, preserves and additions for the vegetarian home cook, all equally made fresh and from unprocessed ingredients.
